metadata.inclusion: Add：It will trigger ADD/REMOVE after press the OPEN button for more than 5seconds. Try again if failed. Notice: The triggering will be activated after the PRESS stopped
metadata.exclusion: B. Remove：It will trigger ADD/REMOVE after press the OPEN button for more than 5 seconds. Try again if failed. Notice: The triggering will be activated after the PRESS stopped
metadata.reset:
Support Device Locally Reset
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
